dc:title: Fall Appeal - October 1970
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Appeals for funds saying, "All small gifts add up, and we surely need them" Mentions the death of two catholic workers and anticipates a two-month trip around the world noting she has seen the poor of the world--"literally."
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 930 1970-10-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
